vars.name: people
vars.expr: [{ name = "Alice"; age = 30; city = "Paris" }; { name = "Bob"; age = 15; city = "Hanoi" }; { name = "Charlie"; age = 65; city = "Paris" }; { name = "Diana"; age = 45; city = "Hanoi" }; { name = "Eve"; age = 70; city = "Paris" }; { name = "Frank"; age = 22; city = "Hanoi" }]

vars.name: stats
vars.expr: [ for (key, items) in List.groupBy (fun person -> person.city) people do

body.expr: (String.concat " " [string (s.city); string ": count ="; string (s.count); string ", avg_age ="; string (s.avg_age)])
